TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner

summary.span: 擴充 Web 伺服器控制項的設計階段行為。

span.span: Extends design-time behavior for the Web server control.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何擴充類別。The following code example demonstrates how to extend the class. 程式碼會覆寫方法，以自訂， ，以及屬性時設計介面上呈現控制項。The code overrides the method to customize the , , and properties when the control is rendered on a design surface. [!code-vb[DataListDesigner_Sample2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataListDesigner_Sample2/VB/simpledatalistdesigner.vb#1)] 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來建立關聯的設計工具與控制項。The following example shows how to use the attribute to associate the designer with the control. [!code-vb[DataListDesigner_Sample2#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataListDesigner_Sample2/VB/simpledatalistdesigner.vb#5)]

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Use of this method is not recommended because template editing is handled in ControlDesigner. To support template editing expose template data in the TemplateGroups property and call SetViewFlags(ViewFlags.TemplateEditing, true). http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=14202")

param.span: 可用於建立樣板 (Template) 編輯框架 (Frame)。

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: ，表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源，，則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both the managed and unmanaged resources; to release only the unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 物件所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the object and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當`disposing`參數是`true`，則方法會釋放所有的受管理物件所持有的資源這個物件參考。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, the method releases all the resources held by the managed objects that this object references.

span.para: 方法可以由其他物件呼叫多次。請確定不會參考已在先前呼叫中處置的物件時加以覆寫， 。如需如何實作這個方法的詳細資訊，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。如需詳細資訊及方法，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源總](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)並[覆寫 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

The method can be called multiple times by other objects. When overriding it, be sure that you do not reference objects that have been disposed in an earlier call to . For more information about how to implement this method, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). For more information about the and methods, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

To support template editing expose template data in the TemplateGroups property and call SetViewFlags(ViewFlags.TemplateEditing, true). http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=14202")

summary.span: 取得設計工具可以使用的已快取處理的樣板編輯動作。

span.span: Gets the cached template editing verbs available to the designer.

returns.span: 物件的陣列，由設計工具可用的快取樣板編輯動作 (Verb) 組成。

span.span: An array of objects consisting of the cached template editing verbs that are available to the designer.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetDesignTimeHtml() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetDesignTimeHtml () As String

summary.span: 取得用來在設計階段表示 控制項的 HTML 標記。

span.span: Gets the HTML markup used to represent the control at design time.

returns.span: 用來在設計階段表示 控制項的 HTML 標記。

span.span: The HTML markup that is used to represent the control at design time.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法以改變的外觀設計介面上的控制項。The following code example shows how to override the method to alter the appearance of the control on the design surface. 此程式碼使用`Try...Catch...Finally`語法來執行下列動作：The code uses `Try...Catch...Finally` syntax to do the following: - `Try`區段會變更的資料格控制項屬性的值。The `Try` section changes the values of the properties of the data grid control. - `Catch`一節會攔截任何例外狀況，並將它們以傳送方法。The `Catch` section catches any exceptions and sends them to the method. - `Finally`區段將屬性設為其原始值。The `Finally` section sets the properties to their original values. 這個範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-vb[DataListDesigner_Sample2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataListDesigner_Sample2/VB/simpledatalistdesigner.vb#2)]

summary.span: 取得在設計階段用來表示空樣板架構控制項的 HTML 標記。

span.span: Gets the HTML markup used to represent an empty template-based control at design time.

returns.span: 在設計階段用來表示空樣板架構控制項的 HTML 標記。

span.span: The HTML markup used to represent an empty template-based control at design time.

span.span: The exception that occurred.

summary.span: 取得當呈現控制項發生錯誤時，指定的例外狀況在設計階段所顯示的 HTML 標記。

span.span: Gets the HTML markup displayed at design time for the specified exception when an error has been encountered while rendering the control.

returns.span: 指定的例外狀況在設計階段所顯示的 HTML 標記。

span.span: The HTML markup displayed at design time for the specified exception.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法來修改外觀時發生例外狀況在設計介面上的控制項。The following code example shows how to override the method to modify the appearance of the control on the design surface when an exception occurs. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-vb[DataListDesigner_Sample2#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataListDesigner_Sample2/VB/simpledatalistdesigner.vb#3)]
